article.Heading: Budget 2016: Don't expect big changes in capital gains tax, says Ketan Dalal
article.Summary: In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy; HP Ranina, Corporate Lawyer; Sudhir Kapadia of EY and Ketan Dalal, Senior Tax partner at PwC India shared their expectations from Arun Jaitely's Union Budget and their outlook on the road ahead.
article.Body:
In an interview to CNBC-TV18's Latha Venkatesh and Sonia Shenoy; HP Ranina, Corporate Lawyer; Sudhir Kapadia of EY and Ketan Dalal, Senior Tax partner at PwC India shared their expectations from Arun Jaitely's Union Budget and their outlook on the road ahead.

Watch the video for the entire discussion...
